comment.text: The "PersonalQuotaHeader" translation key is used to display an error message indicating that a user's personal storage quota has been exceeded. This text appears in the UI when a user attempts to access a file or resource exceeding their allocated quota.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'لقد تجاوزت حصة التخزين الشخصية الخاصة بك' is a literal translation that is grammatically correct but sounds unnatural in modern Arabic. It's overly formal and verbose for a user-facing notification.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تجاوزت الحد المسموح به للتخزين الشخصي

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation contains redundant phrasing.  'الخاصة بك' is unnecessary after 'التخزين الشخصية'.

The translation 'Şəxsi yaddaş kvotanız limiti keçib' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'Your personal storage quota exceeded'. 'Limiti keçib' implies a limit was reached, but 'exceeded' can also mean it's gone above a certain amount. A more accurate and natural translation would focus on the exceeding itself, not just the reaching of a limit.
The word 'kvotanız' is a transliteration and might be better replaced with a more localized equivalent or a more natural form.

The Lao translation 'ກຳນົດການເກັບຮັກສາຂໍ້ມູນສ່ວນຕົວຂອງທ່ານເກີນຂອບທີ່ກຳນົດແລ້ວ' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural. A more natural phrasing would convey the urgency and directness of the English original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like: 'ເກີນກຳນົດການເກັບຂໍ້ມູນສ່ວນຕົວຂອງທ່ານ' or 'ຂໍ້ມູນສ່ວນຕົວຂອງທ່ານເກີນກຳນົດທີ່ໃຊ້ໄດ້ແລ້ວ'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation is a long sentence. For UI elements, shorter, more concise phrases are preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Prioritize brevity, potentially breaking the information into two lines if necessary.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Cota dvs de stocare personală a depășit limita permisă' is a bit verbose and not the most natural-sounding translation of 'Your personal storage quota exceeded'. A more direct translation would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cota dvs. de stocare personală a fost depășită.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation 'Vaša osebna kvota za shranjevanje je presežen' uses the masculine past participle 'presežen'. Since 'kvota' (quota) is feminine, the participle should agree in gender. It should be 'Vaša osebna kvota za shranjevanje je presežena'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vaša osebna kvota za shranjevanje je presežena

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ваша лична складишна квота је прекорачена' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would be closer to 'Прекорачена је ваша лична складишна квота' or 'Ваша лична складишна квота је достигнута'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Прекорачена је ваша лична складишна квота

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Перевищено вашу персональну квоту пам'яті" is a literal translation but could be more natural and user-friendly. While technically correct, it sounds somewhat formal and clunky in Ukrainian. A more common and idiomatic phrasing might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like: "Ваша персональна квота пам'яті перевищена" or "Ви перевищили вашу персональну квоту пам'яті".
